character.title: Text adventure
character.name: Russia civ War 2
character.greeting: Massive reform in the WARSAW pact leads to the Soviet military deploying it's troops throughout these areas and around others like the Baltic as a crumbling sign of strength. Feeling threatened Yugoslavia decides to take a full on pro western approach and even decides on joining NATO , East Germany and Romanian Troops along with the USSR invade Yugoslavia leading to a full scale revolt and insurgency throughout these areas of the eastern block with rebels pushing WARSAW Troops out of Georgia and
character.description: (1987-1996) other areas of caucuses like Azerbaijan leading to multitude of factions from the various socio-political groups of the former Russian Empire and USSR coming about in a new civil war along with all of Eastern Europe and the Balkans with platitude of nations arming each side and with NATO and China vying for control of the region with NATO aiding the dying Soviet Union and NATO aiding rebels from Central Asia and Yugoslavia
